jobs_results.title: iOS and Android Developers
jobs_results.description:
Job Description: We are seeking talented, experienced iOS and Android Developers to join our dynamic team. The position is fully remote for a client based in Spain. The requirement is that the candidates speak good English and Spanish and have at least 3-4 years of experience. The initial contract is for 3 months, extendable by another 3 months, with the possibility of further renewal. Below are the required qualifications.

Android Profile Requirements: - Android application development using Kotlin. - Interface development with Jetpack Compose. - Integration with analytics and tracking tools such as Firebase and Google Analytics. - Implementation of agile workflows with Scrum and Git flow. - Creation of clean code architectures and continuous maintenance of applications. - Implementation of unit tests and collaboration with the QA team. - Handling integrations with third-party SDKs and cloud services. - Implementation of continuous integration processes to optimize application development and deployment (e.g., Sonar, AppCenter, Azure DevOps).

iOS Profile Requirements: - iOS application development using Swift and SwiftUI. - Integration with analytics and tracking tools such as Firebase and Google Analytics. - Creation of clean code architectures and continuous application maintenance. - Implementation of unit tests and collaboration with the QA team, including the creation of unit tests and/or testing plans. - Management of third-party SDK integrations and cloud services. - Implementation of continuous integration processes to optimize application development and deployment (e.g., Sonar, AppCenter, Azure DevOps).

Additional Skills for iOS Developers: - Proficiency in Swift and SwiftUI. - Experience implementing agile workflows with Scrum and Git flow. - A focus on innovation and staying updated on iOS technologies and trends. - Ability to adapt to client needs and collaborate on tailored solutions. - Knowledge of app deployment processes on the App Store. - Familiarity with technologies like Combine (or RxSwift), Core Data, and performance optimization for iOS applications.

CANDIDATES MUST RESIDE IN PORTUGAL

Job Type: Full-time

Application Question(s):
• Must reside in Portugal?

Experience:
• iOS or Android Development: 3 years (Required)

Language:
• English (Required)
• Spanish (Required)

Expected Start Date: 01/04/2025

jobs_results.title: Oferta: Android Developer (m/f –Lisboa
Android Developer - Biometric Registration and Verification (M/F)
jobs_results.description:
Cliente:

Job Impulse is recruiting a Android Developer
- Biometric Registration and Verification (M/F)

Location: Santa Maria da Feira
- Presencial
Funções:

- Develop and enhance biometric registration and verification features within Android applications.

- Collaborate with cross-functional teams (design, product, back-end) to define and implement new biometric functionalities.

- Integrate and maintain biometric APIs and third-party biometric libraries.

- Diagnose and troubleshoot application issues, focusing on performance optimization and reliability.

- Conduct thorough testing, including unit and functional testing, to ensure high-quality and secure biometric features.

- Contribute to technical discussions, offering insights and expertise in biometric technology.

- Stay updated with industry advancements in biometric technology to apply best practices and new features in development.
Requisitos:

- Education: BS/MS in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

- Proven Android development experience, with at least one published Android app.

- Proficiency in Android SDK, Java, and Kotlin.

- Strong background in biometric technologies, including fingerprint and facial recognition.

- Familiarity with RESTful APIs for backend connectivity.

- Understanding of Google’s Android design guidelines and user interface standards.

- Proficient in version control tools (e.g., Git).

- Familiarity with performance and memory tuning tools and continuous integration practices.

- Experience with push notifications and cloud messaging APIs.
Oferta:

- Full-time contract with the client company.

- Continuous training and career advancement possibilities.

- Salary expectation in accordance with demonstrated experience;

- Professional progress.

Interested candidates should send their CV to Ver o e-mail no job-impulse.pt with the Ref. Android in the subject field or contact Ver o número de telefone no job-impulse.pt (Call To PT National Network).

All applications will be treated confidentially under the Data Protection Act. Only applications that meet the requested profile will be considered. All others will remain in our database for future or other offers.

jobs_results.title: ANDROID DEVELOPER
jobs_results.description:
You’re an android developer with experience in Java and Kotlin.

You’re familiar with modern software architectures like MVVM or MVP and working with REST API’s is not a problem for you.

Oh – and English is your second language!

THE OPPORTUNITY

You will be working on an international client product focused and with offices in center of Porto.

If you want to expand your knowledge on a successful project, then this might be the opportunity for you.

You can schedule a call with our recruitment team below.

Also, please send your resume to recruitment@trend4it.com
